title: Were there changes to Fizz R?
body: I noticed 100% of it scales with ap, allowing him to do tremendous damage, he seems to snowball harder than previously, is this the case???

replies.body: The new effect of Fizz ult is fizz deals 20% more damage to the target hit by his ult for a short duration. Good to engage with ult then combo for maximum burst. Quite strong. :)
Are you sure it's 100%? That doesn' sound right. And yes a couple of patches ago they gave it a 20% damage i crease for Fizz on whoever was tagged by it

> [{quoted}](name=TSM BjergWannabe,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=t9jrOqBO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-21T09:16:35.770+0000)
